name: TimeHopper
description:
How to play:

You can start the game directly in your browser or download it for windows.

Story:

You are a hero and arrive in a mysterious dungeon where people need your help! Ojayi the old guy introduces you to your adventure.

This dungeon is known for time rewinding! Keep an eye on the time you're in!

Look for useful items in the dungeon and progress through puzzles and quests to finally defeat the evil Nekrok!

Controls:

WASD to move

I for Inventory

E for Interacting

Space for skipping dialogues

ESC for menu

GameJam:

This game was made for Brackeys Gamejam 2020.2 in one week with two people!
